DOC.brief_summary: The study will evaluate the efficacy of agomelatine compared to placebo on the reduction of Obsessive and Compulsive symptoms after 16 weeks of treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Agomelatine in Patients With Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder
